replies.body:
It might be a good idea to stay on topic in your thread, to prevent it getting locked for spam. You could use Skype to ask him that.

EDIT: Or the millions of other apps and programs that you can use to make contact with other people e.g kik, facebook, twitter and even ingame you could add him as a friend and use /msg.
